meanings.definition: A slang term for a poker machine or slot machine.
meanings.sent1: I won some money on the pokie at the casino.
meanings.sent2: The pokie in the corner of the bar was flashing lights and making sounds.
meanings.sent3: When I played the pokie, it felt like a game of chance.
meanings.sent4: The pokie seemed like a magical money-making box.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pokie was calling out to me to try my luck.

meanings.definition: A small pointed object, typically used for poking or prodding.
meanings.sent1: She used a pokie to stir the campfire.
meanings.sent2: The chef used a pokie to check if the cake was done.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten batted at the pokie with its paw.
meanings.sent4: The pokie was sharp enough to puncture the balloon easily.
meanings.sent5: The pokie left a tiny hole in the paper when she poked it.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a prison.
meanings.sent1: He ended up in the pokie after the robbery.
meanings.sent2: The criminal was finally caught and sent to the pokie.
meanings.sent3: Being in the pokie made him realize the consequences of his actions.
meanings.sent4: The pokie felt like a cage, trapping him inside.
meanings.sent5: The walls of the pokie seemed to close in on him every day.
